name: sightlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without really looking, or without being able to see: stare sightlessly He put his head in his hands, staring sightlessly into his empty glass. She lifted her head sightlessly, tears streaming down her face.
More examplesFewer examplesHe gestured to her from across the room, but she stared back at him almost sightlessly.On top of one of the cabinets, a stuffed owl stared sightlessly towards us.He looked sightlessly at the printed instructions, unable to understand what to do with the buttons.
